name: RecordEventAttendance
description:
Record participation of HubSpot contacts in a marketing event.

Use this tool to record the attendance of multiple HubSpot contacts at a marketing event using their HubSpot contact IDs. This also adds a timeline event to each contact's record. The tool is applicable for the "attend" state with optional properties like "joinedAt" and "leftAt".

parameters.name: marketing_event_id
parameters.description: The internal ID of the marketing event in HubSpot for which attendance is being recorded.

value_schema.description: The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot

parameters.name: attendance_state
parameters.description: Specifies the attendance state of the contact: 'register', 'attend', or 'cancel'.

value_schema.description: The attendance state value. It may be 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'

parameters.name: contact_participation_details
parameters.description: A list of contact details, including ID, properties, and interaction time, for recording event attendance.

interactionDateTime.description: Timestamp in milliseconds at which the contact subscribed to the event.

inputs.description: List of HubSpot contacts to subscribe to the marketing event

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: objectId
parameters.description: The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot

value_schema.description: The internal id of the marketing event in HubSpot

parameters.name: subscriberState
parameters.description: The attendance state value. It may be 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'

value_schema.description: The attendance state value. It may be 'register', 'attend' or 'cancel'

interactionDateTime.description: Timestamp in milliseconds at which the contact subscribed to the event.

inputs.description: List of HubSpot contacts to subscribe to the marketing event

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
